item.description:
@chromeblade0 wrote:

i take it you want my imports this is line 4-34 i will change color of 5-15 i think is what you wanted

import java.io.;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;
import java.util.Calendar;
import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import java.security.;

package org.dementhium.content.minigames.zombies;

import org.dementhium.event.Event;

import org.dementhium.model.player.Equipment;
import org.dementhium.model.definition.ItemDefinition;
import org.dementhium.model.Mob;
import org.dementhium.model.map.Region;
import org.dementhium.content.clans.ClanManager;
import org.dementhium.content.clans.Clan;
import org.dementhium.event.Tickable;
import org.dementhium.content.misc.Extra;

import java.util.LinkedList;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException;

item.title: Advanced (pi)
item.dc:creator: @jaruanna jaruanna
item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

If youâ€™re new you probably wont understand. I will tell you the overall things of the game.

You will need time. So for time use system.currenttimemillis. A boolean to show that the people are in a game so the other players cant join. Point system by using ints and when you kill npc it adds a point. And also using waves.

Thats basically just an overview. When you advance more into java try to make one yourself.

Read full topic
